channel.title: Command help
channel.description: ok i want to make a ::pure to get 80 str 80 range 82 mage 80 hp and 60 atk but the problem is ppl can do ::pure over and over and just get 99 everything.. how can i make it where i can only be done one time?

or, this can be used too,
delete all i told you, this makes you the stats when you login

scroll some down you will see like this addItem(1321, 1); addItem(1189, 1); addItem(556, 400); addItem(557, 400); addItem(558, 400); addItem(555, 400); addItem(554, 400); addItem(562, 400); addItem(841, 1); addItem(882, 500); addItem(995, 2000000);

addSkillXP(302288, 1); addSkillXP(2192818, 2); addSkillXP(2192818, 3); addSkillXP(2192818, 4); addSkillXP(2673114, 6);

this makes when people login they got the stats.

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

the above was wrong. use this 1

first make this code:

[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”)) {
if (pure == 0) {
addSkillXP(302288, 1);
addSkillXP(2192818, 2);
addSkillXP(2192818, 3);
addSkillXP(2192818, 4);
addSkillXP(2673114, 6);
pure = 1;
} else if (pure == 1) {
sendMessage(“You have already did one time this command!”);

}

} [/code]

add this as your command,
Search now for this: } else if (token.equals("character-starter")) { starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

add under it this: } else if (token.equals("character-pure")) { pure = Integer.parseInt(token2);

then search for characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length()); characterfile.newLine();
add under characterfile.newline(); characterfile.write("character-pure = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(pure), 0, Integer.toString(pure).length()); characterfile.newLine();

save,close compile.
If anyproblems, let me know:)

Read full topic

item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @I_D_D_S_I I D D S I
item.description:
@I_D_D_S_I wrote:

[quote=“kidzcoder, post:1, topic:268033”]ok i want to make a ::pure to get 80 str 80 range 82 mage 80 hp and 60 atk
but the problem is ppl can do ::pure over and over and just get 99 everything…
how can i make it where i can only be done one time?[/quote]

here it is: [code]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 1) {
addSkillXP(302288, 1);
addSkillXP(2192818, 2);
addSkillXP(2192818, 3);
addSkillXP(2192818, 4);
addSkillXP(2673114, 6);
sendMessage(“Free stats for me:)”);
}
}[/code]

if you use deltascape change the sendMessage to sM
edit didnt saw people can do it over and over, i make it for u wait 10mins;)

Read full topic
